{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://beagleboard.org/beagleboard |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = BeagleBoard |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = BeagleBoard |model = BeagleBoard |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (rev B7) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = March 11, 2019 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/BeagleBoard |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;OMAP3530; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 |cpu1spd = 720 <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Micron;MT29C2G48MAKLCJI-6; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2009.01;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.28;Angstrom;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SD Card slot, |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 10-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1),, P9 |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, populated,, P2
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = S-Video out, DVI-D, Audio In/Out (3.5mm), |addchip = USB Peripheral Power Management;Texas Instruments;TPS2141;;1;,,, 1A Low-Dropout Regulator;Texas Instruments;TPS73701;;1;,,, Dual Buffer and Driver;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC2G07;;1;,,, Integrated Power Management and Audio Codec;TI;TPS65950;;1;,,, 1A Power-Distribution Switch;Texas Instruments;TPS2061;;1;,,, 1.8V 12Mhz USB Transceiver;Microchip;USB3326A-GL-TR;;1;,,, 1.8V 19.2Mhz USB Transceiver;Microchip;USB3322A-GL-TR;;1;,,, Flat-panel Display Digital Transmitter;TI;TFP410PAP;;1;,,, 2-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;TI;TXS0102DCUR;;2;,,, 3V to 5.5V Single Channel RS232 Transceiver;TI;SN65C3221;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 05/2009 |estprice = 95 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{seealso|BeagleBoard}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[TI]] OMAP3530 @720MHz (ARM Cortex-A8) Processor *RAM: 256MB, 2D/3D graphics accelerator *Connectivity: 2x USB 2.0 ports (Mini-B OTG,Type A HOST) :MMC/SD Card slot, DVI-D, S-Video
The board can be powered by 2 different methods: *5V/2A power supply plugged into the connector *USB Female Mini-B (when powered via USB :the 1x USB Type A ports will not function) {{see also|List of SBCs}}
==Links of Interest== *[https://elinux.org/Beagleboard:BeagleBoard ''BeagleBoard'' on '''eLinux'''] (Rev B7/C2/C3/C4/C5/D)
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/texasinstruments/texasinstruments_beagleboard |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/texas_instruments/beagleboard |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = omap |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a8_vfpv3 |support_started_version = 18.06.0 |current_supported_version = 22.03.7 |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
